mapper.update: update vwShelter set name = #{name}, image = #{image}, address = #{address}, tel = #{tel}, account = #{account}, time = #{time} where seqShelter = #{seqShelter}
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from vwShelter
mapper.insert: insert into tblShelter (seqVet, image, name, address, tel, account, time, content) values (seqShelter.nextVal, default, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{account}, #{time}, null)
